titles.title: A bill to amend Public Law 87-77, to authorize transportation of passengers on foreign flag vessels between certain ports in Alaska and certain ports in the United States outside Alaska.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Referred to Subcommittee on Merchant Marine.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received From DOT.

bill.summary: 12/2/1987--Introduced. Amends Federal law relating to marine transportation of passengers to authorize passenger transportation on foreign-flag vessels among ports in southeastern and south central Alaska, and between points in the United States outside Alaska and points in southeastern Alaska.
